channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison celebrates signing of bill modernizing wage garnishment forms
item.description:
Publication Date: May 08, 2025

SF 2847/HF 2543 finalizes the 2024 Debt Fairness Act and modernizes garnishment forms to make them easier for Minnesotans to understand

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/08_GarnishmentForms.asp
